---
title: "Class diagram"
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
pkgload::load_all()
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	collapse = TRUE,
	comment = "#>",
	out.width = "100%"
)
# Turn on ANSI colors
options(cli.num_colors = 256L)
old.hooks <- fansi::set_knit_hooks(knitr::knit_hooks)
```

```{r}
library(tabulate)
# Global styling
class_diagram <- tabulate_table()
class_diagram %>% 
  table_format() %>% 
  format_font_style("bold") %>% 
  format_font_align("center") %>% 
  format_width(60)

# Animal class
animal <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("Animal")
animal[1,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_font_align("center")

# Animal properties nested table
animal_properties <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("+age: Int") %>% 
  table_add_row("+gender: String")

animal_properties %>% 
  table_format() %>% 
  format_width(20)

animal_properties[2,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()

# Animal methods nested table
animal_methods <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("+isMammal()") %>% 
  table_add_row("+mate()")

animal_methods %>% 
  table_format() %>% 
  format_width(20)

animal_methods[2,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()

animal %>% 
  table_add_row(animal_properties) %>% 
  table_add_row(animal_methods)

animal[3,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()

class_diagram %>% 
  table_add_row(animal)

# Add rows in the class diagram for the up-facing arrow
# THanks to center alignment, these will align just fine
class_diagram %>% 
  table_add_row("â–²");
class_diagram[2,1] %>% 
  cell_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top() %>% 
  format_multi_byte_characters(TRUE)

class_diagram %>% 
  table_add_row({"|"})
class_diagram[3,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()
class_diagram %>% 
  table_add_row({"|"})
class_diagram[4,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()

# Duck class
duck <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("Duck")
duck[1,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_font_align("center")

# Duck properties nested table
duck_properties <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("+beakColor: String = \"yellow\"")
duck_properties %>% 
  table_format() %>% 
  format_width(40)

# Duck methods
duck_methods <- tabulate_table() %>% 
  table_add_row("+swim()") %>% 
  table_add_row("+quack()")
duck_methods %>% 
  table_format() %>% 
  format_width(40)
duck_methods[2,] %>% 
  row_format() %>% 
  format_hide_border_top()

duck %>% 
  table_add_row(duck_properties) %>% 
  table_add_row(duck_methods)

class_diagram %>% 
  table_add_row(duck)

class_diagram[5,] %>%
  row_format() %>%
  format_hide_border_top()

print(class_diagram)
```
